channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024021041
item.description:
Report X-2024021041

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-09
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found wet box in the damage hazmat cage. I filled out the required paperwork and repackaged the damage in a salvage drum. DescribePack: The package failure was from internal leakage caused by a loose cap on some of the container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The leaking package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2024020567
item.description:
Report X-2024020567

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-22T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On Jan 28th during the PM sort a drum was found that was dented and slightly leaking. The drum contains UN3082 Environmentally Hazardous Substance, liquid, n.o.s.(), 9, PGIII. The spill was cleaned up, contained and the consignee was contacted to come and pick up the drum.

item.title: Report X-2024020377

Report X-2024020377

  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE FELL OFF THE ROLLER LINE DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: THE FALL CAUSED THE CAP TO COME LOOSE AND THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.
